summary_md: Croatia, in the year 2024, has a GDP per capita of 17,771 USD per person (NY.GDP.PCAP.KD), with an inflation rate of 2.97% (FP.CPI.TOTL.ZG), and an unemployment rate of 5.24% (SL.UEM.TOTL.ZS). The average life expectancy is 78.47 years years (SP.DYN.LE00.IN), and internet usage stands at 83.20% (IT.NET.USER.ZS). The country's export growth is at 49.80% (NE.EXP.GNFS.ZS).
